description: The dashboard offers a simple view of the resource consumption of the deployed pods and their impact on the cluster. The outline of requests and limits for each pod and their totals can be used as a tool to determine appropriate resource quotas for your cluster.

targets.expr:
(1 - sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes) by (instance) 
/ sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) by (instance)) * 100 + on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info

title: K8s TV
